text: Sirinai Mandar is a book of short stories written by Nilkamal Brahma. "List of Short Stories by Nilkamal Brahma" There are 10 stories in the book. All the stories are written in Bodo language. It was first published in 1985. "The Books of Bodo Literature" ==References== Category:1985 books Category:Short story collections
title: Sirinai Mandar
